statements: SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%report%' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_id, encryption_key FROM encrypted_files WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT file_id, file_name, upload_date FROM encrypted_files WHERE upload_date <= NOW() ORDER BY file_id ASC;
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, file_name, encryption_key FROM encrypted_files WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY file_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_content IS NOT NULL AND upload_date < NOW() LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(file_id) AS avg_file_id, COUNT(*) AS total_files FROM encrypted_files GROUP BY encryption_key;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%confidential%' AND encryption_key IN ('key1', 'key2', 'key3') ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT file_name, file_content FROM encrypted_files WHERE encryption_key = '\x01\x02\x03';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(password) FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_name='example.txt';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files WHERE encryption_key = '\x0123456789ABCDEF';
SELECT file_id, file_name, LENGTH(file_content) AS content_length FROM encrypted_files ORDER BY content_length DESC;
SELECT username, password_digest FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%.pdf');
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files;
SELECT file_name, file_content FROM encrypted_files ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT metadata_id, upload_date FROM file_metadata WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY access_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, encryption_key FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 100;
SELECT file_name, file_content FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 200;
SELECT metadata_id, file_id, upload_date FROM file_metadata ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_id, access_date, user_id FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY access_date ASC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, encryption_key FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%example%' AND encryption_key = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM Files;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM Files ORDER BY file_id DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_data FROM Files WHERE file_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, encryption_key FROM Files WHERE file_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, file_id, access_time FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT f.file_name, u.username FROM Files f JOIN UserFiles uf ON f.file_id = uf.file_id JOIN Users u ON uf.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT file_name, file_encryption_key FROM encrypted_files;
SELECT user_id, action, date_time FROM file_logs ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT file_id, user_id, read_permission, write_permission FROM permissions WHERE read_permission = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_encryption_key FROM encrypted_files WHERE file_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE read_permission = TRUE AND write_permission = FALSE;
SELECT u.username, p.read_permission, p.write_permission FROM users u JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT a.date_time, u.username, f.file_name FROM access_logs a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id JOIN encrypted_files f ON a.user_id = f.file_id;
